com.codeferm.dbaccess

Class DbQueryRunnerConn

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codeferm.dbaccess.DbAccess
      • com.codeferm.dbaccess.DbQueryRunnerConn

  • public class DbQueryRunnerConn
extends DbAccess
    DBUtils QueryRunner extension of DbAccess abstract class that uses a Connection instead of a DataSource.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    sgoldsmith

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DbQueryRunnerConn(java.sql.Connection connection)
      Construct new QueryRunner and persist connection in template in order to use across multiple calls.
      DbQueryRunnerConn(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource)
      Construct new QueryRunner with DataSource.

      • selectList

        public final <T> java.util.List<T> selectList(java.lang.String sql,
                               java.lang.Object[] params,
                               java.lang.Class clazz)
        Return query results as list of beans. DBUtils doesn't handle underscore to camelCase conversions for you. A custom DbBeanProcessor is implemented to handle underscores properly. Connection is not closed.
        Specified by:
        selectList in class DbAccess
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of object that the handler returns.
        Parameters:
        sql - SQL statement to execute.
        params - Initialize the PreparedStatement's IN parameters.
        clazz - Class to map results to.
        Returns:
        List of <T> typed objects.

      • updateReturnKeys

        public final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> updateReturnKeys(java.lang.String sql,
                                                                java.lang.Object[] params)
        Executes the given INSERT statement with parameter array and returns auto generate key. JDBC driver needs to support RETURN_GENERATED_KEYS. Connection is not closed.
        Specified by:
